card.name: Insidious Infestation
card.text: {Flow X} The turn player's units get -X/-X.

card.name: Alice, the Stargazer
card.type: Mythical Arcane Unit — Human Spirit Mage
card.text: {Summon} Scry 4. Add a card with an {Invoke} effect from among them to your hand. {Invoke} Shuffle a card with an {Invoke} effect from your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards.

card.name: Contaminated Subject
card.text:
{Evolve} Gain "{Death} Idolize this card."
"We were not prepared. We had no reason to be."

card.name: Hand of Hedra
card.text:
{Death} Idolize this card.
"They were held hostage by the light of Hedra. Cogs in a machine that knew its function, but not its purpose."

card.name: Hamon, [title goes here]
card.text:
[Hidden] {Upkeep} Annihilate a card. When this card loses [Hidden], summon all cards annihilated this way. Exert: Idolize this card.
"Ah, the sombre breeze that blows once the sounds of battle subside. I miss the relief I would feel, when it would brush against my skin..."

card.name: Hedran Salvator
card.text:
{Summon} Resurrect a unit that costs 2Q or less. While you control that card, this card gets +2/+2.
#

card.name: Hedran Salvager
card.text:
You can return friendly relics to your hand to play this card for 2Q less per card.
#

card.name: Tinithorakh, [title goes here]
card.text:
{Flash} Idolize a friendly unit, and if you do, an enemy unit. Sacrifice a friendly relic: Summon a card with the same name from your deck.
#

card.name: Rite of Immortality
card.text: Target a unit. Copy it, idolize it, then purge the copy.

card.name: Quantum Experiment
card.text: Scry 7. You can summon any units among them, then idolize those units. Shuffle your deck afterwards. {Flash} You can annihilate this card from your graveyard: Annihilate a friendly card, then summon a card with the same name from your deck.
